Content.Text:
Today is <CHILD_NAME>'s birthday. Let's
prepare something special to eat and
celebrate!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yay! Wow look at that food! It looks
so delicious!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yay! Wow look at that food! It looks
so delicious!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>. Your mom made
this for you. Eat a lot so you can
grow up healthy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy B-day, little <CHILD_NAME>! This cake
is just for you! Today you can eat as 
much as you want.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cheers, young <CHILD_NAME>! I hope you
stay sweet forever, just like your
mom <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, my dearest <CHILD_NAME>! Have
some of the delicious food your mother
prepared! Stay healthy and happy.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, happy birthday. I'll give you
a cool present later. You'll love it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>. May you continue
to fill our lives with happiness for
many years to come.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>! Let's celebrate
singing, dancing, eating cake and
having lots of fun!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>! I hope my magic
works and you'll be always cute like me!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>... here's
some... treats from Daddy... eat to 
your heart's content.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>. Have some from
Daddy's scrumptious cooking and stay 
healthy.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <CHILD_NAME>, pumpkin! I baked
you a delicious cake! You can eat as
much as you want, but just today.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, my darling <CHILD_NAME>. I
hope you'll grow up to be just like your
daddy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, Mommy and Daddy! I love you
very much!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you, Mommy and Daddy! I love you
very much!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This was a great party, wasn't it, 
<CHILD_NAME>? I'm looking forward
to next year too.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today was just awesome, right, <CHILD_NAME>?
Let's have even more fun on your
next birthday party!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a remarkable party we had, <CHILD_NAME>.
We should celebrate together again,
next year!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope you enjoyed your birthday party, 
<CHILD_NAME>! Next year we'll celebrate 
again, together.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This was some cool party, <CHILD_NAME>.
I bet you can't wait for next year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you like being prince for a 
day, <CHILD_NAME>? <MYNAME>, we should 
certainly do this again, next year.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wasn't this fun, <CHILD_NAME>? Next year
we'll have a party that will make the
whole town jealous of you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you like your party, <CHILD_NAME>? I'm 
going to create even better tricks for
next year.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, wasn't this nice? We'll 
do it again... next year.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My precious <CHILD_NAME>, you had a lovely 
party. I'm sure our family celebration 
will be even better next year.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME>, did you have a good time? I'm
baking a cake twice as big for your 
next birthday!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a charming birthday party it was, 
my dear <CHILD_NAME>. Next year, I'll 
make it even more enchanting!

Happy birthday,<CHILD_NAME>. I
wish you eternal happiness.
